messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] serious question -- need to know has anyone out there...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/29/2004 9:35:30 AM Central Standard Time, ... i was a member  of HSLDA,for about a year,,they dont support unschooling they others are
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/29/2004 9:35:30 AM Central Standard Time,
staciej26@... writes:


>
>
> You need to raise your children your way. Are you in contact with HSLDA?
>

i was a member of HSLDA,for about a year,,they dont support''unschooling''
they others are right though,,,educate YOURSELF,,the more you know the
better you can deal with them ..
hubbys arent always the best supporteres where their families are concerned,,
mine has a known mental illness,and all my brother in law can say is ''his
lifestyle doesnt reflect his illness''..and he is going in the medical
field...geeeezzzzneither mom or bro. in law will confront me with their
''concerns''but they screw with hubby...but alas,,they know i would most likely tell them
both to bite me ...
anyway,,,educate yourself ,so when you have to hear their crap,,,you can know
what is right.....>>JUNE
